dct_title_s: To His Excellency William Burnet Esq., this plan of Boston in New England is humbly dedicated by His Excellencys most obedient and humble servant Will Burgis
dct_description_sm: engraved by Thos. Johnson, Boston ; reproduced in full-tone Collotype for the Boston Atheneum by the Meriden Gravure Company.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Oriented with north toward the lower right corner.
Includes indexes of building names, settlement dates between 1630-1722, and "Great Fires" between 1653-1711.
"The Eight Company's distinguish'd by the prickt line thus ......".
